Director of Investor Relations - The nexus of technology, real estate and financial services

An integrated group of companies in the real estate and private equity industry, Caliber was formed in 2009 as a response to the need for a transparent investment partner. Headquartered in Scottsdale, Arizona with an investment focus in the Greater Southwest growth markets, Caliber employs more than 600 talented individuals. With a core team of approximately 50 parent company members, Caliber seeks to maintain a close-nit culture as it expands and grows.  The Company is comprised of multiple operating businesses that create 5 core departments: Investment, Construction & Development, Property Management, Brokerage, and Hospitality.Caliber accomplishes its mission by planning and executing asset-based investment strategies, including owning and managing single and multi-family residential properties, acquiring land, office, hospitality and specialty spaces. Currently, the company holds a diversified portfolio in excess of $300,000,000 in assets under management and has earned local and national recognition as a four-year honoree on Inc. 500/5000 List of Fastest Growing Private Companies, 2016 Phoenix Chamber of Commerce Economic Driver Award, 2016 Better Business Bureau Torch Award for Ethics, AZRE 2016 Top Millennial to Watch Out For in Commercial Real Estate, Phoenix Business Journal’s 2015 & 2016 Arizona Corporate Excellence (ACE) Awards for Fastest Growing and Largest AZ Company, LODGING Magazine’s 2016 Top Hotel Innovator and more.

VerdeXchange Arizona is a state, regional and global leadership conference for sustainable economic growth. The annual event has captured the imagination of the leadership with its in-depth content and its consistent drive fostering connections for business contracts. Leaders come because of the rare opportunity to expand their thinking and grow their business structural processes. There are no middle-men at VerdeXchange Arizona – no salesmen – only those who sign on the dotted line.

Playworks impacts more of our school children in a positive way than any other non-profit in Arizona with full time staff in 51 K-8 schools and over 50,000 students. Playworks puts trained teachers on the playground using something as simple as organized recess to reduce bullying and improve school climate.

Principals tell us that nearly all discipline-related problems in school occur during lunch and recess. Instead of going back to class energized and ready to learn, the kids return to class upset and unable to focus.  We can change this. Recess should be fun and energetic and safe and inclusive for everyone. Isn't that what we want for all kids in elementary school today? When recess  becomes a healthy, integral part of the school day, kids carry that positive experience with them beyond the playground. - See more at: http://www.playworks.org/communities/arizona/about#sthash.lfbuQKIi.dpuf

Eliances brings the resources that an entrepreneur needs to start and grow a business all together in one place.  In just one short year, members of Eliances.com have started companies together, taken ideas from napkin to commercialization in months, raised $$MMs through crowdfunding, been on national television through media partners and helped local non-profits find board members and philanthropists to support them.  If you support the entrepreneurial community and job creation and growth this is a great organization to join.

Brian Dutter
Do good things and good things happen
March 25, 2017, Brian was a client of Brion’s

My wife and I have been working with Brion for well over a year now and could not be happier with the results.  We have always wanted to have a portion of our investments in real estate but were tired of the responsibilities that come along with that ownership.  Brion introduced us to the Caliber model and it has been a fantastic fit.  Brion's style is one that has an emphasis on educating and less of a "salesman" approach.  There is genuine concern that the projects we are looking at have mutually beneficial characteristics.  We greatly appreciated that, despite the fact that we are probably one of the smaller clients at Caliber, we are still treated as if we are royalty.  Brion made us feel like we belonged at Caliber and we receive as much time and attention as we request and need. I would tell any investor that you are in very good hands with Brion Crum and the Caliber investment family.

March 25, 2017, Megan was a client of Brion’s

Brion has helped two generations of my family protect their assets and grow their businesses and wealth. His authenticity, enthusiasm, and intelligence are unmatched in an industry that is usually inundated with misunderstanding. He is one of the few wealth advisors, who has actually explained the world of investing in a way that my entire family understood it. Because of his efforts in educating us, we are able to make smart decisions about our money and our businesses. I feel unfairly constrained to simple words when describing how much Brion has done for us, so I will simply say thank you!

summary: Connector - Income Accelerator-Wealth Preserver At Caliber: The Wealth Development Company there's no pipe dream promises, just tangible investments with tangible returns!We help successful business owners including doctors & attorneys, real estate investors, corporate executives, top sales performers in their industry and especially people who are growing & selling successful businesses be able to directly access wealth building strategies previously only available to institutions & the mega wealthy.  If you are open to seeking greater wealth for yourself and your loved ones Please use Book Now link to Schedule a call/meeting with me: http://booknow.so/contact-brioncrum to explore these exciting opportunities. Caliber:The Wealth Development Company is an Inc 500/5000 company for 4 years in a row, Brion is the Director of Investor Relations where his primarily role is to drive revenue and profitability to all business units and increase shareholder value for their investors.  Caliber uses a private equity structure to offer access to an asset class that comprises nearly 20% of the US yet is almost exclusively limited to institutional investors. Caliber supports the local business community by hosting Caliber Summit events that provide speakers on topics of interest to business owners, entrepreneurs &investors. We also have a crowd-funding portal that will be used to raise capital for Arizona businesses & projects.Caliber specializes in the following aspects of real estate:1.) Private equity / Private placements2.) Private lending3.) Joint ventures4.) Fix & Flips5.) Asset Re-positioning6.) Asset Management7.) Note Acquisitions8.) Property Management9.) Remodeling & Construction10.) FinancingCaliber specializes in the following types of assets:1.) Hospitality2.) Multi-Family Apartments (Large & Specialty)3.) Single Family Residences4.) Office / Commercial
